resources.string: King Of Strategy
Hello blank fragment
Increase Archer Base Damage By %6 (Fire)
Incrase Archer Base Damage By %10 (Battle)
Decrease Enemy Horseman Debuff On Archers By %9 (Fire)
Archers Deal %12 Increased Damage To Enemy Horsemans (Fire)
Decrease Enemy Archer Base Damage By %8 (Fire)
Swordsmans Weaken Enemy Horsemans By %17 (Shock)
Increase Swordsman Base Damage By %5 (Battle)
Swordsmans %8 More Resistant To Enemy Archers (Fire)

Cavalry Basics\nAll Horsemans %10 Stronger At Shock Phase
Better Organization\nAll Friendly Troops %5 Stronger At Every Phase
Anti-Shock Tactic\nDecrease Shock Phase Length By 1
Wide Positioning\nDecrease Damage Taken at Fire Phase by %25
Bow To Knife\nFriendly Archers %30 Stronger at Battle Phase
Frontal Ambush\nEnemy Horsemans and Swordsmans %15 Weaker At Battle Phase
Anti-Ranged Rain\nFriendly Archers Focus Enemy Archers And %30 Stronger At Fire Phase
Nordic Charge\nIf You Have No Horsemans, Your Swordsmens %40 Stronger At Battle Phase
Death Circle\nIf You Have More Troops At Battle Phase, Your Troops %30 Stronger At Battle Phase
Fear Dash\nAll Enemies %10 Weaker At Every Phase
Burning Haystacks\nDeal Huge Amount Of Damage At Fire Phase For Each Member Of Your Army
Shield Wall\nPrevent An Enemy Archer Damage For Every Swordsman You Own
Riders Of HorseLand\nStarts Shock Phase Immediately And Your Horsemans %35 Stronger
Great Horn\nReinforcements Arrive At Battle Phase, Equal %30 Of Your Remaining Troops
To Arms!\nAt Start Of Battle Phase All Friendly Troops Become Swordsmans But %10 Weaker
